title: Blissful Broome Apartment Retreat near Famous Cable Beach with Four Outdoor Pools
description:
Stay within moments of Broome's most iconic beach at Oaks Cable Beach Resort, a mere 15-minute walk to its famous white sands and crimson sunsets. Unwind at one of the resort's four shimmering swimming pools, with the resort's facilities geared towards ensuring guests' ultimate comfort during their stay. Conveniently located at the gateway to Western Australia's Kimberley region, the resort offers access to some of the country's most awe-inspiring natural wonders.

Take a day trip to the powerful Horizontal Falls, admire the stunning contrast of red pandan sands and sapphire water on the Dampier Peninsula, or simply enjoy camel rides on Cable Beach at sunset. Do it all on your beachside stay, before stretching out in your very own spacious apartment with family or friends, equipped with everything you need for a relaxing stay between adventures.
offer_address: 11 Oryx Road, Cable Beach, Western Australia 6726, Australia

title: Experience Australia's Outback from Famous Cable Beach
description: Escape to Western Australiaâ€™s picturesque pearling town of Broome, staying in the town's only five-star property, the Kimberley Sands Resort & Spa. Enjoy four days/three nights with daily breakfasts, $300 worth of spa credits, a Mount Romance relaxation pack, discounts on sensational local attractions including an iconic camel ride, Willie Creek Pearls tour, sea turtle kayaking experience and more. From $599 for two adults, valued up to $1,670. Check out our exclusive resort video below.

title: Blissful Broome Oaks Escape near Famous Cable Beach
description: Stay within moments of Broome's most iconic beach at Oaks Cable Beach Resort, a mere 15-minute walk to the famous white sands and sunsets of Cable Beach. The resort's facilities are geared towards ensuring guests' ultimate comfort: cool off at four swimming pools and one kids' pool, and feast on modern Australian fare in between sips of an ice-cold beer at the breezy Cables Restaurant & Bar. The resort is located at the gateway to Western Australia's Kimberley region, so you can enjoy easy access to some of the country's most awe-inspiring natural wonders.
offer_address: 11 Oryx Road, Cable Beach, Western Australia 6726, Australia
